parameter.name: host
parameter.label: AirTouch Host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of the AirTouch device

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: AirTouch Port
parameter.description: Port to connect to the AirTouch device

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: How often the device is polled (seconds). Airtouch status changes are normally received instantly. This value controls how often the binding requests an update.
